2164.subject: ED
2164.descrlong:
Continues Multiple Subject teacher candidates' field-based experiences in a program approved K-6 classroom. Candidates have full responsibility for planning and instruction in all subjects supported by their cooperating teachers and university supervisor. Requires the equivalent of 4 half days and 1 full day/week, and an all day 5 week period corresponding with the K-6 teacher calendar. (Offered spring semester and as interest warrants. May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online).

(Coreq: ED 603A)
